content.text:
# Comparison of nucleic acid simulation software

This is a list of notable computer programs that are used for nucleic acids simulations.
{| class="wikitable sortable"
|-
! Name
! View 3D
! Model build
! Min
! MD
! MC
! REM
! Crt
! Int
! Exp
! Imp
! Lig
! GPU
! Comments
! License
! Website
|-
| Abalone
|  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || DNA, proteins, ligands ||  || [http://www.biomolecular-modeling.com/Abalone/ Agile Molecule]
|-
| AMBER
|  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || AMBER force field ||  || [http://ambermd.org ambermd.org]
|-
| Ascalaph Designer
|  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || AMBER || , GPL || [http://www.biomolecular-modeling.com/Ascalaph/Ascalaph_Designer.html biomolecular-modeling.com]
|-
| CHARMM
|  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || CHARMM force field ||  || [https://web.archive.org/web/20090325101042/http://www.charmm.org/ charmm.org]
|-
| CP2K
|  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || , GPL || [http://www.cp2k.org/ cp2k.org]
|-
| Forecaster (Fitted)
|  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || Small molecule docking to nucleic acids with water placement || Free for academia, Proprietary || [https://www.molecularforecaster.com/products#drug-discovery-anchor Molecular Forecaster]
|-
| ICM
|  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || Global optimization ||  || [http://www.molsoft.com Molsoft]
|-
| JUMNA
|  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||
|-
| MDynaMix
|  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || Common MD || , GPL || [http://www.fos.su.se/~sasha/mdynamix/ Stockholm University]
|-
| Molecular Operating Environment (MOE)
|  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || [http://www.chemcomp.com/ Chemical Computing Group]
|-
| Nucleic Acid Builder (NAB)
|  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || Generates models for unusual DNA, RNA || , GPL || [http://casegroup.rutgers.edu New Jersey University]
|-
| NAnoscale Molecular Dynamics (NAMD)
|  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || Fast, parallel MD, CUDA ||  || [http://www.ks.uiuc.edu/Research/namd/ University of Illinois]
|-
| oxDNA
|  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || Coarse-grained models of DNA, RNA || , GPL || [http://dna.physics.ox.ac.uk dna.physics.ox.ac.uk]
[https://docs.lammps.org/Packages_details.html#pkg-cg-dna LAMMPS CG-DNA]
|-
|QRNAS
|  ||  ||  ||   ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || High resolution refinement of models of RNA, DNA and hybrids using AMBER force field . ||, GPL || [http://genesilico.pl/software/stand-alone/qrnas Genesilico] [https://github.com/sunandanmukherjee/QRNAS.git Github]
|-
|SimRNA
|  ||  ||  ||   ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || Coarse grained modeling of RNA || Free for Academic, Proprietary|| [http://genesilico.pl/software/stand-alone/simrna Genesilico]
|-
|SimRNAweb
|  ||  ||  ||   ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || Coarse grained modeling of RNA |||Free || [https://genesilico.pl/SimRNAweb/ Genesilico]
|-
| YASARA
|  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  || Interactive simulations ||  || [http://www.yasara.org www.YASARA.org]
|-
|}
